cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)

exm.mng: variant of 馬蜂|马蜂[ma3 feng1]
(like) a cat on a hot tin roof, anxious, agitated
exm.pyn: rè guō shang de mǎ yǐ

exm.mng: lit. like locusts tied to one rope (idiom), fig. in the same boat, in it together for better or worse, to sink or swim together
exm.pyn: yī tiáo shéng shàng de mà zha

exm.mng: see 一條繩上的螞蚱|一条绳上的蚂蚱[yi1 tiao2 sheng2 shang4 de5 ma4 zha5]
exm.pyn: yī gēn shéng shàng de mà zha
